title: Women's gymnastics
creator_credit: Ryan Films and Dr Frank Ryan
brief_description: Various routines - prescribed or imaginative - must be performed in both national and international competition; on the balance -beam, the uneven parallel bars; the side-horse, and floor exercises. Judges score from zero to ten, depending on the performer’s competence and confidence.
